title.description: The title of the trait in different languages.

description.description: The description of the trait in different languages.

properties.description: List of properties associated with this trait.

requirements.description: List of requirements for this trait that must be satisfied before the trait can be acquired.

trait.description: Indicates another the ID of another trait that must be possessed before this trait can be acquired.

traitProperty.description: Indicates that the character must possess a number of traits with this property before the trait can be acquired.

count.description: The number of traits with the given property that must be possessed. Defaults to 1+.

capabilities.description: List of capabilities granted by this trait.
